entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Arviat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:50 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -40.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41 with temperature rising to minus 35 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow at times. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 41 with temperature rising to minus 35 by morning. Wind chill minus 62 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
